input.sentences: today was a whirlwind tour of the local festival !
first we listened to some old school music .
then we watched a particularly poor living statue for a short while .
we went along to the 'best leek ' competition . it was mighty competitive this year . this is the winner !
the rest of the vegetables paled in comparison | though we were impressed with some of the carrots .
output.sentences: There was a big parade in the town square.
There were horn players in the parade.
There were politicians in the parade.
The parade was in honor of the town's farmers.
Awards were given to the best farmers.
